== Installation ==
The installation of this !WordPress plugin is simply easy. Follow these steps and you can make it work immediately:
 # Download the latest version of this plugin in [http://code.google.com/p/wordpress-ultimate-toolkit/downloads/list Download Page].
 # Unzip the archive, and upload the directory `wordpress-ultimate-toolkit` to `wp-content`
 # Activate the plugin in your !WordPress administration page. e.g. `http://yourdomain.com/wordpress/wp-admin/plugins.php`
